document.full_text: having children spurred spanish award-winning director and script-writer julia montejo to turn her hand to literature and she has just published her second novel with a third one on the way.
document.title: spanish film-maker tackles invisible legacy in book
lines_and_colors: having children spurred spanish award-winning director and script-writer julia montejo to turn her hand to literature and she has just published her second novel with a third one on the way.
